topic_metadata.title: How to align figures and their captions to the left?

posts.name: jsx97
posts.cooked:
Normally, if #image is wrapped in #figure, the figure is aligned to the center of the page.

How can I align figures and their captions to the left instead, in the whole document?
posts.raw:
Normally, if `#image` is wrapped in `#figure`, the figure is aligned to the center of the page.

How can I align figures and their captions to the left instead, in the whole document?

posts.cooked: To align all figure kinds to the left you can use #show figure: set align(start), to only affect figures with images you can use #show figure.where(kind: image): set align(start).
posts.raw: To align all figure kinds to the left you can use `#show figure: set align(start)`, to only affect figures with images you can use `#show figure.where(kind: image): set align(start)`.
